00007     printf("test case for bug #78891 - reported by Chris Mah, April 15th 1997\n");
00008     printf("Uses WriteConsoleInput() to inject keystrokes for \"ESC y\"\n");
00009 
00010     printf("WritEscY attempts to inject \"ESC y\" into the console input stream\n");
